Text:
function ERI_EP05_07()
    --.承-3【1月第3週】「ボクの帰りを待つヒトたち」
    SaveData.Title = "ボクの帰りを待つヒトたち"

    --//CG：ミナトの腕を掴むアキラ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV025ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0829.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, Akira...?" ]])

    MSG([[ At first, I thought it was a dream. But surely, I could feel Akira's small fingers gripping my arm. ]])

    MSG([[ Impossible. But it was real. Akira was holding my arm, which was about to fall, and supporting me―― ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0830.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Why...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0715.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, that's my line...!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0716.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "After being missing for days, why on earth are you ICANFLYing in the middle of the night at school!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0717.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Do you know how worried I was... ugh!" ]])
    --//SE：フェンスにぶつかる音（ガシャン！）
PLAY_SE("SEb022.wav")
WAIT(500)

    --//CG：ミナトの腕を掴むアキラ（鼻血）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV025ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0831.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira couldn’t support my weight and staggered, hitting her face against the fence. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira is a much weaker girl than me. There’s no way she could pull up a boy’s body like mine. ]])

    MSG([[ I was doing my best just not to fall. Seeing her desperately gripping my arm while blood trickled from her nose was incredibly painful to witness. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0832.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, let go of my hand—it's dangerous. You’ll get hurt too, Akira." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0718.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No... I absolutely won’t let go." ]])

    MSG([[ Tears spilled from Akira’s eyes, and a voice of anguish escaped her lips. ]])

    MSG([[ I never imagined things would come to this. My precious person was suffering right in front of me, and instead of offering help, I was the cause of the pain... ]])

    MSG([[ It was an unbearably painful situation. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0833.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That’s enough. Just having you come to me made me really happy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0834.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’m fine, so please let go of my hand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0719.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Idiot, you idiot, idiot...! There’s no way you’re fine...!" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira shouted louder than I’d ever heard. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0720.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin, you’re always like that! No matter how painful or hard it is, you always say you’re okay...!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0721.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You worry about others, but you never let us worry about you! You can rely on us at least now, can’t you...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0835.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "B-But..." ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t bear to see anyone suffer for me—especially Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ I was causing Marika-nee-san pain. I betrayed everyone at Yuriai Private Academy, deeply hurting them. ]])

    MSG([[ And on top of that, making Akira cry and hurt—I couldn’t endure that. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0836.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I hate seeing you cry for me. I want you... to keep smiling forever." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0837.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "So please, let go of that hand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0722.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Geez...! How can something this simple not be understood unless it’s said out loud...!" ]])

    --//CG：ミナトの腕を掴むアキラ（叫び）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV025ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0723.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Listen carefully to my words, you stupid Minato!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0838.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-Yes!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira shook her head fiercely and shouted with determination. I was so taken aback by this new force that I gave a weak reply. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0724.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Listen! I’m helping you not for your sake! I do it because I love you! Because I’ll cry if you’re gone!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0725.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I need you way more than you think!! So if you understand, try harder to live seriously!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0726.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Are you going to break the promise to always stay by my side, you stupid bastardーーー!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0839.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira..." ]])

    MSG([[ For the first time, I received Akira’s honest feelings. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0840.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (I can’t die yet) ]])

    MSG([[ My heart thundered. Hot blood rushed through my body. A burning emotion welled up from my core. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0841.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (I don’t want to die. I have to live. I must live.) ]])

    MSG([[ Tears I thought had dried overflowed, and my body, chilled by the night wind, grew warm. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0842.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I want to live too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0843.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I want to be with Akira... forever." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0844.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Please, save me...! Akira!" ]])

    --//CG：ミナトの腕を掴むアキラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV025ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ When I squeezed Akira’s hand back, she finally smiled. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0727.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well said. But I can’t do this alone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0728.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Smart Akira won’t try to solve this hardship alone like Minachin or Mariccho would." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0729.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Now, Minachin, you have to lend me your strength too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0730.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Let’s both shout out for help loudly." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0845.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0051")
    MSG([[
    【Minato・Akira】
 "Someoneーーー!! Please helpーーー!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Then, Akira and I shouted for help as loudly as we could. We kept calling out again and again. ]])

    MSG([[ Without thinking whether help would come, we focused all our energy on what we could do now and struggled to live. ]])
    --//SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ Then, strangely, I felt the presence of people gathering. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0847.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh, c-could it be..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0732.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hehe—I'm smart, so I don’t fight battles without a chance of winning. I expected I couldn’t pull up Minachin’s body." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0733.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If we just bought enough time, I believed those searching all over the school would come to help." ]])

    --吉　せっかくなので、少しの間立ち絵進行
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0527.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Wha!? What’s this? What’s going on!? Why's Minato-kun about to fall!?" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(250)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0323.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuahhh!? Sister is in troubleーーーー!?" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(250)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Hey, Ryuguuin! Go put some mats down below just in case!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(250)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0341.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I’ve already arranged that without you telling me. Seniors, hurry to Minato-san’s side." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(400)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "I’m coming to help now, Minato-donoーーーー!!!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA301aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Anticipating something like this, I brought a rope." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Well done! As expected of #3!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV025ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I could even hear Lira, Hiyu, Uran, Ouga, and the seniors’ voices. ]])

    MSG([[ No way. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I had been lying all along. Even though I must have betrayed everyone’s expectations. ]])

    MSG([[ Why are so many people gathering for me? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0734.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "When I explained the reason Minachin was cross-dressing, everyone immediately cooperated to help find him." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0735.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You’re not just with me and Mariccho now. You’re loved by so many others." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0736.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s far from over. Our ‘Bokuhime PROJECT’ is just getting started!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0848.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Everyone... you’re still worried about me." ]])

    MSG([[ Over these past weeks of darkness, it felt like light pierced through. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like Akira said. I’m not alone anymore. I’m not like I was back then when Marika-nee held my hand. ]])

    MSG([[ So many people are holding my hand, pushing me forward, supporting me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0849.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Nee-san... I’m sorry I almost gave up. But this will be the last apology." ]])

    MSG([[ I was truly stupid. I had been so focused on following Marika-nee that I didn’t see anything around me. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if I fall to rock bottom now, I’ll be fine. ]])

    MSG([[ Because now, I have friends. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0850.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "This time, ‘we’ will surely save Marika-nee――" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0528.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Akira, I’ll grab her arm, so switch with me! Hiyu, you too, help from that side!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0324.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyuahhhhh! Berserker mode, activatedーーー!" ]])
    --//SE：化け物の迫る音
PLAY_SE("SEz004.wav")
WAIT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0529.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Can you activate that voluntarily...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I’ll wrap a lifeline around Minato’s body from outside the fence! Ryuguuin, you handle the wrists!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0342.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I’m prepared even without your order. Seniors, please get ready to pull the rope." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0023")
    MSG([[
    【Seniors】
 "Woooooo!!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Friends pulling me up from rock bottom—so many of them... ]])
    --//effect：明滅
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ Hearing everyone’s lively voices, my eyelids suddenly grew heavy―― ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ And then my consciousness faded away. ]])
    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_08")
end
